comment:
* A helper object to translate the screen and window coordinates back and forth.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void translateRectInScreenToAppWinFrame(Rect rect)
methods.comment: * Translate the screen rect to the application frame.

methods.name: public void translateRegionInWindowToScreen(Region transparentRegion)
methods.comment: * Translate the region in window to screen.

methods.name: public void translateCanvas(Canvas canvas)
methods.comment: * Apply translation to the canvas that is necessary to draw the content.

methods.name: public void translateEventInScreenToAppWindow(MotionEvent event)
methods.comment: * Translate the motion event captured on screen to the application's window.

methods.name: public void translateWindowLayout(WindowManager.LayoutParams params)
methods.comment:
* Translate the window's layout parameter, from application's view to
         * Screen's view.

methods.name: public void translateRectInAppWindowToScreen(Rect rect)
methods.comment: * Translate a Rect in application's window to screen.

methods.name: public void translateRectInScreenToAppWindow(Rect rect)
methods.comment: * Translate a Rect in screen coordinates into the app window's coordinates.

methods.name: public void translatePointInScreenToAppWindow(PointF point)
methods.comment: * Translate a Point in screen coordinates into the app window's coordinates.

methods.name: public void translateLayoutParamsInAppWindowToScreen(LayoutParams params)
methods.comment:
* Translate the location of the sub window.
         * @param params

methods.name: public Rect getTranslatedContentInsets(Rect contentInsets)
methods.comment:
* Translate the content insets in application window to Screen. This uses
         * the internal buffer for content insets to avoid extra object allocation.

methods.name: public Rect getTranslatedVisibleInsets(Rect visibleInsets)
methods.comment:
* Translate the visible insets in application window to Screen. This uses
         * the internal buffer for visible insets to avoid extra object allocation.

methods.name: public Region getTranslatedTouchableArea(Region touchableArea)
methods.comment:
* Translate the touchable area in application window to Screen. This uses
         * the internal buffer for touchable area to avoid extra object allocation.
